name: RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG
description: This table containers a list of rich text values for a component on the result.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for a group of rich text values for a component on the result from the tables RSTL_COMP_RTF_VAL_PTR  or RSLT_REPEAT_RTF_VAL_PTR.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for one line of rich text values for a component on the result from the tables RSTL_COMP_RTF_VAL_PTR  or RSLT_REPEAT_RTF_VAL_PTR.

columns.name: RICH_TEXT
columns.description: The rich text values for a component on the result.
